divs: Sighting Detailsdriving south thru abeline, texas.before we got into the outer limits of town isaw one black cloud to my left, noticed, but said nothing, allen pass says, heythats the only cloud in the sky. and we stare like something was gonna happen.then the cloud became a perfect triangle that seemed to be pointed to the skythen pointed to the S.W. it moved so fast into the regular. city lighted clouds.never saw it again. i felt excited but slow to think.
